p: Similar variations in relative abundance of bacterial communities by species and study site were observed at genus level ( Fig 5c). For example, Propionibacterium spp. and Achromobacter spp., respectively, were more abundant in Ae. mcintoshi (6.6%) and Ae. ochraceus from Ahero (16.6%) compared to other sites. Unclassified genera from family Flavobacteriaceae was more abundant in Ae. ochraceus from Ahero (16.2%) while Lactococcus spp. was more abundant in Ae. ochraceus from Masalani (13.6%). Staphylococcus spp. was more abundant in both mosquito species from Masalani (17â€“17.4%).
